name: Hazardous Shell
effects: Physical damage (1.8x, ATK) to all enemies
Inflict 2 random status effects (Petrify 100% and Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze, Confusion and Disease 30%) to all enemies

Hazard Shell

desc_short: Damage and inflict random status ailment on all enemies

desc_long: Damages all enemies and randomly inflicts poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, or stone.
攻擊全體敵人並隨機施加異常狀態。
적 전체에 피해를 주고, 무작위로 상태이상을 부여합니다.
